item.title: Lol
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:35, topic:371534”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=467619.msg3424305#msg3424305 date=1291778418]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=467619.msg3424187#msg3424187 date=1291773607]

Powerbot.org now isn’t it?
[/quote]RSBots is a site for paid bots; it’s not the same as RSBot (now PowerBot)

Jc, the reason I don’t use that is because you need to pay for the good bots. I don’t want to spend more money on the game. I also like being able to write my own scripts.

But your scripts will most likely fail ingame, because of their simplicity. [No offense to you.]
[/quote]The only script I’ve ever had fail was the Ivy one, and a magic garden one. I didn’t write either of them. The Ivy one was just a crappy script (but has been fixed), and the magic garden one was because of my computer. Even a paid garden script wouldn’t work for me.[/quote]
I mean, it’s ‘fun’ to write your own script, but there’s definitely a higher chance of detection.

Read full topic

item.title: Lol
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:37, topic:371534”][quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=467619.msg3424498#msg3424498 date=1291786323]
I’d never pay for a god damn script anyway. Not being a cheap arse, I just wouldn’t. (Although I am a cheap arse).
[/quote]well a good reason would be to make an account good, than sell it. it could be a way to make money o_O just giving a reason to buy a script[/quote]

Personally, I would not do that.

@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:34, topic:371534”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=467619.msg3424187#msg3424187 date=1291773607]

Powerbot.org now isn’t it?
[/quote]RSBots is a site for paid bots; it’s not the same as RSBot (now PowerBot)

Jc, the reason I don’t use that is because you need to pay for the good bots. I don’t want to spend more money on the game. I also like being able to write my own scripts.

But your scripts will most likely fail ingame, because of their simplicity. [No offense to you.][/quote]The only script I’ve ever had fail was the Ivy one, and a magic garden one. I didn’t write either of them. The Ivy one was just a crappy script (but has been fixed), and the magic garden one was because of my computer. Even a paid garden script wouldn’t work for me.

item.title: Lol
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:13, topic:371534”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=467619.msg3419723#msg3419723 date=1291422709]

[quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=467619.msg3419700#msg3419700 date=1291421715]

Obviously a bot, eh?

Thats the point…

Why do you have to come along everywhere and troll at me? I swear you specifically look for my name.
[/quote]He didn’t troll?

Imagine going abroad for two weeks, suicide botting, and it failing like this on the first day. Lol.
[/quote]Yea, that would suck rofl.

I just happened to notice he always has something to say to/about me.

The “…” suggested that he had an attitude with me in his post, and I just want to know if he has any sort of a problem against me.

As soon as I know, I won’t escalate this any further with any crap/flame/spam/troll. If there’s any hate towards me I’d rather fix it.[/quote]he just thinks he’s really smart/above others. don’t worry about it

Read full topic

item.title: Lol
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:1, topic:371658”]I’m surprised you can detect attitudes by the simplest of punctuation.

Usually, when I use, or see, multiple periods, I think to myself, either that was sarcasm, or they were upset.

I’ve never come to the conclusion of multiple periods being of an attitude.[/quote]
I either think that it was sarcasm, the person is upset, or he has an attitude.

Depending on the situation, I usually get it right.

I think he might just be upset or something.

Read full topic
